text:
What's New in Hafiz Pro

• Completely redesigned user interface for a cleaner and more intuitive experience
• Offline reading support— access the Qur'an anytime, anywhere
• Basmallah issue fixed for accurate recitation flow
• Daily notification reminders to keep you consistent
• Ayah translation & transliteration now available
• Play, pause, and repeat Ayah for effective memorization
• Guess the next Ayah by Surah, Juz or random verses
• Multiple language support — switch easily within the app
• More reciters added based on user requests

Thank you for your continuous support and feedback. More powerful features are on the way. Keep learning, keep memorizing, and keep growing with Hafiz Pro
